entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:52 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
